sys_script.description:
The purpose of this business rule is that anytime the short desc, desc, or business service values of an incident are changed, to run Astound Predict again and store the latest predicted value to the hidden field x_na_astound_predi_[target field name]. This is used mainly for metrics to determine accuracy when it is compared against the business service field.
This sends the Logs on the Update events.
sys_script.name: onUpdate-Predict
